entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
